org.pac4j.oidc.client

Class OidcClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OidcCredentials,OidcProfile>
          • org.pac4j.oidc.client.OidcClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OidcCredentials,OidcProfile>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AzureAdClient

    public class OidcClient
extends IndirectClient<OidcCredentials,OidcProfile>
    This class is the client to authenticate users with an OpenID Connect 1.0 provider. By default, this implementation relies on the "code" response type. (http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html).
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Michael Remond
